channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point ZoneAlarm -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point ZoneAlarm -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-8452|2024-08-04T21:17:31.550Z -- check%20point%20zonealarm -- check%20point%20zonealarm
item.description: A hard-link created from log file archive of Check Point ZoneAlarm up to 15.4.062 or Check Point Endpoint Security client for Windows before E80.96 to any file on the system will get its permission changed so that all users can access that linked file. Doing this on files with limited access gains the local attacker higher privileges to the file.
